title: Promote currently deployed draft build to production (publish-only)

requirements.summary: Document and execute a publish-only promotion of the currently deployed draft artifact to production without rebuilding or changing the app.
acceptanceCriteria: The production deployment completes successfully using the exact same artifact as the current draft (no new build changes).
After publishing, the production URL/canister serves the same UI/behavior as the draft that was approved.
No backend schema/state migrations are introduced as part of publishing.

file_operations.description: Add a publish-only runbook describing how to promote the already-built draft artifact to production (no rebuild, no code/config changes), including verification steps (URL checks, key user flows) and explicit notes to avoid introducing migrations or any app changes during the publish action.
